init.characterSays: Hello Merchant. Looking to make some deals?

after_welcome.characterSays: Say, are you the merchant Incanto told me to be expecting?

incantato_sent_me.characterSays: Good grief. This is about Randy, isn't it?

whos_randy.characterSays: I've been a thief for a long time, but I began by teaching illusion magic. I still teach when I find someone with potential.

you_taught_randy.characterSays: I suppose I trusted the wrong person. Even after all these years of thieving, I'm still not a great judge of character.

need_to_find.characterSays: That will be difficult. I picked him because of his incredible ability to impersonate people without using magic.

looks.characterSays: Unlikely. With magic and his intense attention to detail, he will appear identical.

voice.characterSays: He doesn't need magic to perform a perfect impression.

items.characterSays: No. You are thinking about this all wrong. He is the perfect mimic. He misses no details.

responses.text: So how do I find them?

so_how.characterSays: Hmmm... He doesn't know how to barter. He steals what he needs. He'd be a lousy merchant.

what_mistakes.characterSays: Look for a merchant selling their coins for cheap. That will be Randy.

is_that_it.characterSays: I'll pay you good coin for the tracker.
